# SHLibrary

**Class**

An object that represents a user’s synced Shazam library.

## Declaration

```swift
final class SHLibrary
```

## Managing the items in the library

- **default**: An instance of the default Shazam library.
- **addItems(_:)**: Adds an array of media items to the user’s Shazam library.
- **removeItems(_:)**: Removes an array of media items from the user’s Shazam library.
- **items**: The list of synced items in the Media Library.

## Update the user’s Shazam library

- **SHMediaLibrary**: An object that represents the user’s Shazam library.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Observable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
